form.label: Subdomains
form.description: Recent search results combined with historic data from the discovered_subdomains lookup

search.query: index="easm" sourcetype="easm:subdomain" | stats count by easm.target | rename easm.target AS target | table target

index="easm" sourcetype="easm:subdomain" easm.target="$targetToken$" | stats max(_time) as last_seen, min(_time) as first_seen, latest(ip) as ip, latest(discovery_source) as discovery_source by easm.entity, hostname | eval _time = last_seen | rename easm.entity as entity | eval ip = mvjoin(ip,",") | convert ctime(*seen) | table entity, hostname, ip, last_seen, first_seen, discovery_source
